thread.title: The world reacts to the Apple launch
thread.title_full: The world reacts to the Apple launch

title: The world reacts to the Apple launch
text:
Unfortunately, some people were left upset because products they wanted were not announced. The product we all want to be announced at the Apple Event.. pic.twitter.com/yyLALcU4Sj — Professor Snape (@_Snape_) September 9, 2015 apple dropping the air jobs III today? pic.twitter.com/7qTXu5cOZ9 — Four Pins (@Four_Pins) September 9, 2015 
And then there were the people who missed the mark completely. Latest apple news: I'm eating one in my backyard surrounded by cats. Don't worry I'll keep you up to date pic.twitter.com/5QaePGPf29 — Laura Hudson (@laura_hudson) September 9, 2015 Some of you have been asking about the apple specs. It is 1) round 2) red and green 3) this size next to a cat pic.twitter.com/eP8vPgOKap
